Articles.Content:
I'm just curious if anyone has suggested or mentioned Touch Screen Optimizations. Both the windows PCs I use now have multi-touch, by default holding down on the screen is right click, and pinching the screen is a scroll wheel.

-Would it be possible to have touching and dragging on the screen act as Right mouse + Mouse movement?

-Would it be possible to enhance pinch to zoom by making it more sensitive? (counting touch screen use as more scrolls of a mouse-wheel?)
